resources.string: The journey to London and rest of nations took place last year with an advancemnt in the most modern frameworks London as all other places on earth is a heavenly place to live , event though the cost of livig there is a bit high anyone with a descent job can acocmadate there even n the most times of unemployemnet .. The beauty of Lonodn can be only defined with its ability to colaborate with veryone else in the world
